channel.title: Let us Meet Up!
channel.description:
Planning and following ActivityPub-related events and gatherings.
## Check the agendas!
- [SocialCG Agenda](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/c/meeting/socialcg/l/agenda) keeps track of upcoming W3C Social Community Group meetings - [SocialHub Agenda](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/c/meeting/l/agenda) keeps tracks of other events
## Use the calendar!
- Our [Meeting calendar](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/c/meeting/l/calendar) allows you to subscribe to the event feed with iCal and RSS.

item.title: Let us Meet Up!
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
Planning and following ActivityPub-related events and gatherings.

Check the agendas!

  • SocialCG Agenda keeps track of upcoming W3C Social Community Group meetings
  • SocialHub Agenda keeps tracks of other events

Use the calendar!

  • Our Meeting calendar allows you to subscribe to the event feed with iCal and RSS.
